update.name: Dirty-Pipe
update.description: Simple Exploit for Dirty Pipe Vulnerability (CVE-2022-0847) This repository contains a simple proof of concept (PoC) for the Dirty Pipe vulnerability (CVE-2022-0847), which affects Linux kernel versions 5.8 to 5.16. This exploit demonstrates local privilege escalation  by leveraging improper handling of pipe buffers in the kernel.
